page.title: 02BASILDON NE: HOUSING
page.content:
The houses here are built mainly in terraces on an open plan system with front gardens that open on to the pavement, and grassed areas nearby for small children to play. Some of the houses were built with just a pavement in front, or round a courtyard.
Early housing was reasonably well spaced, but the newer housing gives many people a sense of being shut in. Few families had cars when the town was first being developed, so most of the roads are narrow and unsuitable for today's busy traffic. With many families now owning cars, landscaped areas and front gardens are being replaced by hard standing for cars.
Problems such as subsidence, vandalism and lack of finance for repairs are taking their toll of the area.
